column5: I've posted some pics before, but here is the video from our trip to Quantz Lake last September. As others have said, Hearst Air is top notch all the way around. Quantz lake a great trophy pike lake with unlimited numbers of small and medium sized walleye. I'm sure there are big ones if you hunt for them. We cared more about catching enough for lunch and then chasing big pike.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=no3chwUW8SQ
Amazing job on the video and Thanks for posting it. Looks like an awesome trip had by your group. The camera man has an awesome eye for picture perfect photos. Thanks Mike
Really good video and trip report. Reminds me so much of our trips. Never get tired of watching these fly in Canadian fishing videos. Can't wait to go. 23 days. Thanks for posting.
